S3 Asset documentation

Using the s3 asset we can perform some functionalities on s3 bucket like

On upload functionality possibilities are

  • upload_file
  • upload_file_binary

On download functionality possibilities are

  • download_file
  • download_folder
  • download_binary_content

On delete functionality possibilities are

  • delete

On list_files functionality possibilities are

  • list_files



Upload


This feature helps in uploading the files to s3 bucket. It will upload the given source file to s3 and returns the upload path as response

Download


This feature downloads the specified file from s3 bucket to destination path and returns True if download success or False otherwise. It will alsoo support recursive download if we set keyword arguent 'recursive' to true (default is false).

Delete


This feature deletes the given file from s3 bucket and returns True if deletion successful or False otherwise.

List Files


This feature provide the list of the files in the s3 bucket for specific prefix. If prefix is not specified it will return all the files. It also support pagination. PageSize default value is 100 and MaxItems default value is 1000 and page. If page is not provided it will return total response.
